definitions: the action or method of storing something for future use

examples.text: the chair can be folded flat for easy storage

shortDefinitions: action or method of storing something for future use

definitions: the retention of retrievable data on a computer or other electronic system; memory

examples.text: a storage capacity of two megabytes

shortDefinitions: retention of retrievable data on computer or other electronic system

definitions: space available for storing something, in particular allocated space in a warehouse

examples.text: Cooper had put much of the furniture into storage

definitions: the cost of storing something in a warehouse.
shortDefinitions: cost of storing something in warehouse
